subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Tony Raines will drive in his first Nascar Sprint Cup race of the season Sunday, 400 miles around the grinding, high-banked concrete track in Dover, Del.
snippet: Tony Raines will drive in his first Nascar Sprint Cup race of the season Sunday, 400 miles around the grinding, high-banked concrete track in Dover, Del.
